label: 大学
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: An institution to train sons of the aristocracy, especially those below the highest level, in the fields of Chinese-based knowledge required for a career as an official.  Staffed by Doctors and more junior scholars, it came under the Bureau of Ceremonial.  It accepted any boy between his thirteenth and sixteenth years whose father held the fifth rank or above, as well as selected boys from an eighth rank background. [RK]
